entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
